title: Timetable generator
noConstraintsHint: There are no any constraints yet. To add some constraints, click on the "Add new rule" button below

other.maxSatiPredmeta: largest daily duration of subject classes
other.maxTrajanjeBoravkaNaFaksu: largest duration of stay around faculty
other.maxTrajanjeRupe: largest allowed duration of time gap
other.minBrojDanaBezNastave: smallest amount of days without classes
other.maxBrojUzastopnihDanaDugoTrajanjeNastave: largest amount of consecutive days with a lot of classes
other.maxBrojUzastopnihDanaRaniPocetak: largest amount of consecutive days that start pretty early
other.maxBrojDanaDugoTrajanjeNastave: largest amount of days with a lot of classes
other.maxBrojDanaRaniPocetak: largest amount of days that start pretty early
other.apiKeyRequiredForDistanceMatrixAutofill: The API key required to autofill distance matrix isn't configured in the application
other.noRouteFoundForSelectedTravelMode: Distance matrix cannot be generated for selected travel mode. Try selecting another travel mode option
other.pendingGeocodingTimeoutReached: Some location addresses could not be resolved due to possible network connectivity issues. Try again later
other.locationAddressesNotResolveable: Some location addresses could not be resolved. Try to be more precise
other.noCoursesSelectedError: In order to set selected rule, there should be enrolled courses!
other.gapDefinitionRequiredError: There is a rule that defines largest allowed amount of time gaps, but belonging time gap definition still hasn't been set!
other.ajaxRequestFailedError: An error has occurred while trying to fetch next matching timetable!

home.timetablingUnavailableForGivenRequest: Solving timetabling problem for given request is unavailable. This is most likely due to issues with data generation/preparation
